title: A Little Piece of Sky
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Take-out, Bakery, British, Catering, English
description: Sister cafe & next door to Sky Apple restaurant, this vegetarian deli offers a selection of hot and cold sandwiches, pies, pasties, vegan and gluten-free cakes, and house-made vegan cheeses. Extensive take out menu.
